text: SCARM means Simple Computer Aided Railway Modeller – software for easy and precise design of model train layouts and railroad track plans.
label: n

text: With SCARM you can easily create the layout of your dreams. Just download the setup package, install it and start editing your first track plan.
label: n

text: In SCARM you can use unlimited number* of tracks and objects from more than 225 libraries and instantly see your design in 3D preview with a single click.
label: n

text: for Windows XP or Vista or 7 or 8 or 10
label: n

text: Model Train Layouts and Track Plans
label: n

text: I am using SCARM since about three years and - after I've got used to it - find it very helpful. Therefore I'd like to thank you very much for providing this wonderful tool! Greetings from Switzerland!
label: n

text: This is the best modelling software
label: n

text: Windows XP or Vista or 7 or 8 or 10
label: n

text: After installing, start the program and select your preferred language from "View" > "Language" menu.
label: n

text: If you are upgrading from a previous beta version, please, read the article Everything About The Transition to SCARM 1.0.0 .
label: n

text: What you can do with SCARM software?
label: n

text: You can create complex railroad layouts with many train stations on virtually unlimited area
label: n

text: You can shape flex-tracks easily, intuitively and most important – in very realistic way
label: n

text: You can deploy your layout on more than one level, with different heights and slopes for chosen sections of the track route
label: n

text: You can place tunnels and bridges on the track plan
label: n

text: You can draw figures to create buildings of train stations, houses, industries, etc. together with all needed roads and infrastructure
label: n

text: You can use semaphores and color light signals to create the signalling in the layout track route
label: n

text: You can see a 3D view of your layout - just select "3D" button from the toolbar and review your design from all sides and angles
label: n

text: You can measure distances and check track sections' lengths using the "Tools" menu
label: n

text: You can export and or or print your layout and share it with other model train fans and enthusiasts
label: n

text: You can view and print a list with the track pieces needed and even use it as a shopping list
label: n

text: the main program with various extensions like the Model Trains Simulator
label: n

text: You can share your ideas with the author, request new features and report bugs and errors, if you find any
label: n

text: SCARM software supports more than 225 track and object libraries.*
label: n
